title: Hash1Gaming - Recruiting - Diamond+ Team & Gold+ Team

embed.description: Beat the best, smash the rest!

body:
Hey there guys,

Update: We're in need of ~~junglers~~ Support Players! If you'd like to apply to become a player for our active roster, please let me know prior to your application via email or Lol chat.

My name is Tom and I'm the manager of Hash1Gaming. As of 1/1/15 we're recruiting several players to come play on our League of Legends team. Right now we're looking for all types of players to fill spots in both our amateur (Gold+) and Diamond+ teams. If you're a player who has the skill and dedication to hopefully one day play in tournaments, then you're perfect for our team!

To join, just fill out the application found below and we'll be in touch with you as soon as we can. I've also linked some information so you can check us out on social media and all that!

If you want to ask questions or need clarification about something, shoot me an email at admin [@] Hash1Gaming.com

Join: http://hash1.pw/joinhash1

Update: We're currently doing tryouts from 04/01/15 - 11/01/15. We ask that any applicants who wish to try out for the diamond/challenger team get in contact with us via email or in-game AFTER submitting an application. 


Website: http://hash1gaming.com
Twitter: http://twitter.com/hashonegaming
Twitch: twitch.tv/hash1gaming

replies.body: Applied, really enjoyed the application system too, well set out. Look forward to hearing from you soon.

I would Love to Join! I'm currently Gold 4 . I have skype. I'm a support main but can also play mid or top. I can play a wide range of champions and if you would take the time to add me you can ask me any other questions. My name on league of legends is: Et3rnal! Thanks!
We're still looking for players. Get in touch with us if you think you'll be a good fit!

I'd like to try out for mid or ad 
I filled out an application
We've still got a few open spots, so please fill out the form and we'll be in contact :)

I was like YAY a team i can join!

Oh wait, Gold+
il try out for the diamond mid spot.

> [{quoted}](name=ALL Gizzel LoL,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=tMQMsaTs,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-01-03T10:10:13.461+0000)
>
> il try out for the diamond mid spot.

Sounds good, just fill out the form at http://hash1.pw/joinhash1

Hey Safehouse, thanks for applying. I'm glad you found it easy and nicely set out.

We'll get in touch with you later this week. :)

Cheers,

Tom.
